anya-e0811n:12_0: Saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ vāṇī, mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0811n:16_0: Tathāpi tu vaḷañjenti, suddhamāgadhikā na te.
anya-e0811n:25_0: Kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā, yesaṃ natthi garūni’ha;
anya-e0811n:32_0: Yena tosenti viññū ye, tattha pya’vihitā’darā.
anya-e0811n:34_0: Bandho ca nāma sadda,tthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
anya-e0811n:35_0: Pajja gajja vimissānaṃ, bhedenā’yaṃ tidhā bhave.
anya-e0811n:37_0: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
anya-e0811n:41_0: Alaṅkatā’va sobhante, kiṃ nu te nira’laṅkatā?
anya-e0811n:44_0: Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
anya-e0811n:53_0: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
anya-e0811n:56_0: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ?
anya-e0811n:61_0: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
anya-e0811n:79_0: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0811n:81_0: Visesya madhikaṃ yenā, jhattha metaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0811n:85_0: Kiliṭṭhaṃ taṃ yathā tāya, so’ya māliṅgyate piyā.
anya-e0811n:94_0: Yamakaṃ tañca pādāna, mādi, majjha, nta, gocaraṃ.
anya-e0811n:105_0: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
anya-e0811n:110_0: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sa hitaṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0811n:118_0: Yamakaṃ taṃ pahelī paheḷi (ka.) ca, nekantamadhurāni’ti;
anya-e0811n:124_0: Ya dappatīta mānīya, vattabbaṃ neyya māhu taṃ;
anya-e0811n:125_0: Yathā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0811n:127_0: Nedisaṃ bahu maññanti, sabbe sabbattha viññuno;
anya-e0811n:130_0: Siyā visesanāpekkhaṃ, yaṃ taṃ patvā visesanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:131_0: Sātthakaṃ taṃ yathā taṃ so, bhiyyo passati cakkhunā.
anya-e0811n:133_0: Hīnaṃ kare visesyaṃ yaṃ, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0811n:137_0: Yathā hi vande buddhassa, pādapaṅkeruhaṃ pi ca.
anya-e0811n:140_0: Saddato atthato vuttaṃ, yattha bhiyyopi vuccati;
anya-e0811n:141_0: Ta mekatthaṃ yathā’bhāti, vārido vārido ayaṃ.
anya-e0811n:148_0: Kāpi paññā, kopi paguṇo, pakatīpi aho tava.
anya-e0811n:157_0: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃnvi’daṃ?
anya-e0811n:160_0: Tampi gāmmaṃ tya’bhimataṃ, yathā yābhavato piyā.
anya-e0811n:162_0: Vuttesu sūcite ṭṭhāne, padacchedo bhave yati;
anya-e0811n:163_0: Yaṃ tāya hīnaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, yatihīnanti sā pana.
anya-e0811n:169_0: Taṃ name sirasā cāmi, karavaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ;
anya-e0811n:170_0: Sakalāpi disā siñca, tiva soṇṇarasehi yo.
anya-e0811n:172_0: Saro sandhimhi pubbanto, viya lope vibhattiyā;
anya-e0811n:179_0: Name taṃ sirasā sabbo, pamā’tītaṃ tathāgataṃ;
anya-e0811n:180_0: Yassa lokaggataṃ patta, sso’pamā na hi yujjati.
anya-e0811n:182_0: Munindaṃ taṃ sadā vandā, mya’nantamati muttamaṃ;
anya-e0811n:183_0: Yassa paññā ca mettā ca, nissīmāti vijambhati.
anya-e0811n:187_0: Paṇamāmi jinaṃ taṃ pa, varaṃ varaguṇā’layaṃ.
anya-e0811n:190_0: Khettaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, desaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0811n:196_0: Gāviputto balibaddho, tiṇaṃ khādī pivī jalaṃ.
anya-e0811n:198_0: Bandhe pharusatā yattha, taṃ bandhapharusaṃ yathā;
anya-e0811n:199_0: Kharā khilā parikkhīṇā, khette khittaṃ phalatya’laṃ.
anya-e0811n:207_0: Bhoga, saggādi, nibbāna, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
anya-e0811n:211_0: Mayekasmiṃ guṇā sabbe, yato samuditā ahuṃ.
anya-e0811n:214_0: Yācito’haṃ kathaṃ nāma, na dajjāmya’pi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0811n:219_0: Vise siṅgimhi nadiyaṃ, roge rājakulamhi ca.
anya-e0811n:225_0: Vākyatthato duppatīti, karaṃ gāmmaṃ mataṃ yathā;
anya-e0811n:226_0: Poso vīriyavā so’yaṃ, paraṃ hantvā na vissamī.
anya-e0811n:248_0: Taṃ kathaṃ nāma megho’yaṃ, visado sukhaye janaṃ?
anya-e0811n:252_0: Paṇītopi rasā’peto, cittā me sāmi te gati.
anya-e0811n:258_0: Pahelikāya paheḷikāya (ka.) māruḷhā, na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā;
anya-e0811n:259_0: Piyā sukhā’liṅgitaṃ ka, māliṅgati nu no iti.
anya-e0811n:262_0: Tato yamaka maññaṃ tu, sabba metaṃmayaṃ viya.
anya-e0811n:274_0: Tantissara virodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ?
anya-e0811n:290_0: Imā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti nibbharaṃ.
anya-e0811n:312_0: Sappo sappo! Ayaṃ handa, nivattatu bhavaṃ tato,
anya-e0811n:331_0: Dunoti kāmacaṇḍālo, so maṃ sadaya niddayo;
anya-e0811n:335_0: Yato na savanu’bbegaṃ, heṭṭhā yesaṃ vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0811n:339_0: Desaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, khettaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0811n:361_0: Nibbāna, bhoga, saggādi, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
anya-e0811n:373_0: Ocityaṃ nāma viññeyyaṃ, loke vikhyāta mādarā;
anya-e0811n:382_0: Tiṇāyapi na maññittha, so vo detu jayaṃ jino.
anya-e0811n:393_0: Pasāda mācare niccaṃ, sajjane saguṇepi ca.
anya-e0811n:423_0: Dassessaṃ te tato dāni, sadde sambhūsayanti ye.
anya-e0811n:444_0: Muninda manda sañjāta, hāsa candana limpitā;
anya-e0811n:448_0: Yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ hotī’ha, sopi ojo’va taṃ yathā.
anya-e0811n:454_0: Yato puññena te sentu, jina pāda’mbujadvaye.
anya-e0811n:460_0: Siyā samasuti pubbā, vaṇṇā’vutti paro yathā.
anya-e0811n:463_0: Tadā pabhuti dhammassa, loke jāto mahu’ssavo.
anya-e0811n:471_0: Mudūhi vā kevalehi, kevalehi phuṭehi vā,
anya-e0811n:472_0: Missehi vā tidhā hoti, vaṇṇehi samatā yathā.
anya-e0811n:476_0: Hadayaṅgamataṃ yāti, sataṃ deti ca nibbutiṃ.
anya-e0811n:490_0: Caranti sādhū sādhu (sī-chandhānurakkhaṇatthaṃ) sambuddha, kāle keḷiparammukhā.
anya-e0811n:502_0: Sabandhagāravo so’yaṃ, sileso nāma taṃ yathā.
anya-e0811n:510_0: Pādambhoja rajo litta, gattā ye tava gotama;
anya-e0811n:511_0: Aho! Te jantavo yanti, sabbathā nirajattanaṃ.
anya-e0811n:516_0: Udāro sopi viññeyyo, yaṃ pasattha visesanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:539_0: Apāṇe pāṇīnaṃ dhammo, sammā ādhīyate kvaci,;
anya-e0811n:547_0: Uṇṇā puṇṇi’ndunā nātha! Divāpi saha saṅgamā;
anya-e0811n:555_0: Madhurepi guṇe dhīra, na’ppasīdanti ye tava;
anya-e0811n:560_0: Disā samantā dhāvanti, kundasobhā sa lakkhaṇā.
anya-e0811n:572_0: Atisundara maññaṃ tu, kāmaṃ vindati gāmmataṃ.
anya-e0811n:581_0: Bhāsanto madhuraṃ dhammaṃ, kaṃ na sappīṇaye janaṃ.
anya-e0811n:593_0: Accantakantā kantā yato accantakantā (ka.) va vuccante te tato’dhunā.
anya-e0811n:599_0: Līlā vikanti subhago, disā thira vilokano;
anya-e0811n:617_0: Parivutti, bbhamo, bhāvo, missa, māsī, rasī, iti.
anya-e0811n:619_0: Ete bhedā samuddiṭṭhā, bhāvo jīvita muccate;
anya-e0811n:620_0: Vaṅkavuttīsu posesi, sileso tu siriṃ paraṃ.
anya-e0811n:631_0: Nā’laṃ hantuṃ jine’saṃ tvaṃ, taṇhaṃ taṇhāharopi kiṃ?
anya-e0811n:634_0: Sadda, tthagammā, vākyattha, visayā,ti ca sā bhidhā.
anya-e0811n:636_0: Samāsa, paccaye, vā’dī, saddā tesaṃ vasā tidhā;
anya-e0811n:642_0: Ivādī iva, vā, tulya, samāna, nibha, sannibhā;
anya-e0811n:645_0: Sarī, sarikkha, saṃvādī, virodhi, sadisā, viya;
anya-e0811n:649_0: Savaṇṇā, bhā, paṭinidhi, sadhammā, di salakkhaṇā.
anya-e0811n:654_0: Tassa coreti sobhaggaṃ, tassa kantiṃ vilumpati;
anya-e0811n:657_0: Kacchaṃ vigāhate, tassa, ta manvetya, nubandhati;
anya-e0811n:681_0: Khayī cando, bahurajaṃ, padumaṃ, tehi te mukhaṃ;
anya-e0811n:694_0: Samāsa, ppaccaye, vādi, saddayogaṃ vinā api.
anya-e0811n:720_0: Uddhaṃ samuggatassā’pi, kiṃ te canda vijambhanā.
anya-e0811n:725_0: Haṃsī’vā’yaṃ sasī bhinna, liṅgā, kāsaṃ sarāni’va;
anya-e0811n:726_0: Vijāti vacanā, hīnā, sā’va bhatto bhaṭo’dhipe.
anya-e0811n:735_0: Karonti cā’daraṃ dhīrā, payoge kvaci de’va tu.
anya-e0811n:738_0: Piyo pāṇā ivā’yaṃ me, vijjā dhana’miva’ccitā.
anya-e0811n:746_0: Asesa vatthu visayaṃ, ekadesa vivutti vivatti (ṭīkā), ca;
anya-e0811n:747_0: Taṃ dvidhā puna paccekaṃ, samāsādivasā tidhā.
anya-e0811n:751_0: Sirasā na pilandhanti, ke muninda pada’mbujaṃ.
anya-e0811n:754_0: Ratanāni guṇā bhūrī, karuṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ;
anya-e0811n:766_0: Sukhaṃ ke vā na vindanti, passantā munino mukhaṃ.
anya-e0811n:776_0: Rūpakāni bahūnye’va ṭīkāyaṃ uddhaṭaṃ yuttarūpakaṃ sitapupphujalaṃ lola,
anya-e0811n:783_0: Natthi yaṃ tena viññeyyaṃ, avutta manumānato.
anya-e0811n:785_0: Punappuna muccāraṇaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ yaṃ, yamatthassa, padassa ca;
anya-e0811n:789_0: Mano harati sabbesaṃ, ādadāti disā dasa;
anya-e0811n:794_0: Vibhā senti ca sabbāpi, candādīnaṃ hatā viya.
anya-e0811n:797_0: Jitvā viharati klesa, ripuṃ loke jino ayaṃ;
anya-e0811n:801_0: Dīpakaṃ nāma taṃ cādi, majjha, ntavisayaṃ tidhā.
anya-e0811n:813_0: Jinā’nani’ndu indu ca, kassa nā’nandako bhave.
anya-e0811n:817_0: Taṃ pītihetu, sā cā’yaṃ, passaddhyā’di pasiddhiyā.
anya-e0811n:828_0: Ekākī’ nekasenaṃ taṃ, māraṃ sa vijayī jino;
anya-e0811n:829_0: Kathaṃ ta mathavā tassa, pāramībala mīdisaṃ.
anya-e0811n:833_0: Paṇāmo nanu so ye’va, sakimpi sugate gato.
anya-e0811n:836_0: Saccaṃ na te gamissanti, sivaṃ sujanagocaraṃ;
anya-e0811n:837_0: Micchādiṭṭhi parikkanta parikanta (ka.), mānasā ye sudujjanā.
anya-e0811n:844_0: Tepi lokahitā sattā, sūriyo candimā api;
anya-e0811n:845_0: Atthaṃ passa gamissanti, niyamo kena laṅghyate.
anya-e0811n:849_0: Gato’va nibbutiṃ sabbe, saṅkhārā na hi sassatā.
anya-e0811n:852_0: Jino saṃsārakantārā, janaṃ pāpeti pāpesi (ka.) nibbutiṃ;
anya-e0811n:853_0: Nanu yuttā gati sā’yaṃ, vesārajja samaṅginaṃ.
anya-e0811n:857_0: Sayaṃ rāgaparītā hi, pare rañjenti saṅgate.
anya-e0811n:859_0: Vācce gamme tha vatthūnaṃ, sadisatte pabhedanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:864_0: Tulyo tva masi bhedo tu, sarīrene’disena te.
anya-e0811n:886_0: Na hoti khalu dujjanya, mapi dujjanasaṅgame;
anya-e0811n:889_0: Janako, ñāpako ceti, duvidhā hetavo siyuṃ;
anya-e0811n:896_0: Munino desanā’yaṃ me, kāmaṃ toseti mānasaṃ.
anya-e0811n:918_0: Ālāpa hāsa līḷāhi, muninda! Vijayā tava;
anya-e0811n:919_0: Kokilā kumudāni co, pasevante vanaṃ jalaṃ.
anya-e0811n:924_0: Pītiyā me samuppannā, santa! Sandassanā tava;
anya-e0811n:925_0: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, tave’va puna dassanā.
anya-e0811n:952_0: Vasaṃ nenti’va dhīraṃ taṃ, tadā yogā’bhiyogato.
anya-e0811n:959_0: Muninda! Pādadvande te, cāru rājiva sundare;
anya-e0811n:962_0: Maññe, saṅke, dhuvaṃ, nūna, miva, micceva mādihi;
anya-e0811n:963_0: Sā’yaṃ byañjīyate kvā’pi, kvā’pi vākyena gamyate.
anya-e0811n:967_0: Pīṇentā jina! Te sādhu, janaṃ sarasataṃ nayuṃ.
anya-e0811n:981_0: Thutiṃ karoti nindanto, viya taṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:982_0: Dosā’bhāsā guṇā eva, yanti sannidhi matra hi.
anya-e0811n:985_0: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha!, Guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ?
anya-e0811n:987_0: Visesi’cchāyaṃ dabbassa, kriyā, jāti, guṇassa ca;
anya-e0811n:988_0: Vekalladassanaṃ yatra, viseso nāma yaṃ bhave.
anya-e0811n:990_0: Na rathā, na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā, na padātayo;
anya-e0811n:994_0: Na baddhā bhūkuṭi, neva, phurito dasanacchado;
anya-e0811n:995_0: Mārāribhaṅgaṃ cā’kāsi, muni vīro varo sayaṃ.
anya-e0811n:1003_0: Na kharaṃ, na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda! Vacanaṃ tava;
anya-e0811n:1011_0: Puttā me pādasambhattā, sajjā sante’va tādise.
anya-e0811n:1025_0: Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.
anya-e0811n:1028_0: Viruddhā, viruddhā, bhinna, kammā, niyamavā, paro;
anya-e0811n:1031_0: Ocitya samposakādi, sileso, padajā’di padajāti (ka.) pi;
anya-e0811n:1040_0: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
anya-e0811n:1044_0: Mano pīṇeti jantūnaṃ, jino vācāya bhāya ca.
anya-e0811n:1062_0: Sadayo pya’dayo pāpe, cittā’yaṃ munino gati.
anya-e0811n:1069_0: Saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ, sā matā tulyayogitā.
anya-e0811n:1072_0: Ubhohi raṃsimālī ca, bhagavā ca tamonudo.
anya-e0811n:1074_0: Atthantaraṃ sādhayatā, kiñci taṃ sadisaṃ phalaṃ;
anya-e0811n:1075_0: Dassīyate asantaṃ vā, santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0811n:1090_0: Purā paraṃ siriṃ vindi, bodhisatto’ bhinikkhamā.
anya-e0811n:1093_0: Satto sambodhiyaṃ bodhi, satto sattahitāya so;
anya-e0811n:1096_0: Gopetvā vaṇṇanīyaṃ yaṃ, kiñci dassīyate paraṃ;
anya-e0811n:1097_0: Asamaṃ vā samaṃ tassa, yadi sā vañcanā matā.
anya-e0811n:1100_0: Purato na sahassesu, na pañcesu ca tādino;
anya-e0811n:1105_0: Sampuṇṇo candimā nā’yaṃ, chatta metaṃ manobhuno.
anya-e0811n:1114_0: Siyā ekāvali sā’yaṃ, dvidhā vidhi, nisedhato.
anya-e0811n:1117_0: Pādā nakhāli rucirā, nakhāli raṃsi bhāsurā;
anya-e0811n:1123_0: Nā’layo yo sa jantūnaṃ, nā’nanta byasanā vaho.
anya-e0811n:1125_0: Yahiṃ bhūsiya bhūsattaṃ, aññamaññaṃ tu vatthunaṃ;
anya-e0811n:1129_0: Mahantiṃ vindatī kantiṃ, sopi teneva tādisiṃ.
anya-e0811n:1131_0: Kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa, kriyāya ca, guṇassa ca;
anya-e0811n:1135_0: Jalanti candaraṃsīhi, samaṃ satthu nakhaṃ savo;
anya-e0811n:1140_0: Pāpaṃ disā suvimalā, saha sajjana cetasā.
anya-e0811n:1145_0: Guṇā sabhāva madhurā, api loke’ka bandhuno;
anya-e0811n:1148_0: Yassa kassa ci dānena, yassa kassa ci vatthuno;
anya-e0811n:1152_0: Muninā samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsirī muninda! samanuppatto, dāni sabbaññutāsiriṃ (ka.).
anya-e0811n:1155_0: Saṃsayā’pagataṃ vatthuṃ, yattha so’yaṃ bhamo mato.
anya-e0811n:1161_0: Yena kenaci vaṇṇena, bhāvo nāmā’ya mīrito.
anya-e0811n:1163_0: Nanu teye’va santāno, sāgarā na kulācalā;
anya-e0811n:1164_0: Manampi mariyādaṃ ye, saṃvaṭṭepi jahanti no.
anya-e0811n:1166_0: Aṅgaṅgi bhāvā sadisa, balabhāvā ca bandhane;
anya-e0811n:1170_0: Pasatthā munino pāda, nakha raṃsi mahānadī;
anya-e0811n:1171_0: Aho! Gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
anya-e0811n:1174_0: Veso sabhāva madhuro, rūpaṃ netta rasāyanaṃ;
anya-e0811n:1175_0: Madhū’va munino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0811n:1192_0: Ko nāma passitu malaṃ khalu tāsa mantaṃ.
anya-e0811n:1205_0: Citta vutti visesā tu, bhāvayanti rase yato;
anya-e0811n:1215_0: Jigucchā, vimhayo, ceva, samo ca nava ṭhāyino.
anya-e0811n:1219_0: Ye te caranti sīlena, te honti byabhicārino.
anya-e0811n:1233_0: Sattikā sātvikā (ka.) pya’nubhāvatte, visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti te.
anya-e0811n:1236_0: Thambho, paḷaya, romañcā, tathā seda, ssu, vepathu;
anya-e0811n:1239_0: Yadā ratyādayo bhāvā, ṭhitisīlā na honti ce;
anya-e0811n:1240_0: Tadā sabbepi te bhāvā, bhavanti byabhicārino.
anya-e0811n:1261_0: Assādiyatta mānīya, māno ṭhāye’va so raso.
anya-e0811n:1274_0: Yutyā bhāvānubhāvā te, nibandhā posayanti naṃ;
anya-e0811n:1289_0: Jeṭṭhe majjhe’dhameti ettha majjhe adhameti padacchedo majjhe’dhame ca kamaso.
